snippet.title: Mayday Memory (ENG sub) Trailer
snippet.description:
I can hear your voice. Mayday, mayday!
✨Mayday Memory OPEN!✨
(KR / EN )

AOS : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lucydream.maydaymemory
iOS : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mayday-memory-%EC%BD%94%EB%AF%B9-sf-%EC%97%AC%EC%84%B1%ED%96%A5-%EB%A1%9C%EB%A7%A8%EC%8A%A4/id1495623807

Finding our hidden memories, [ Mayday Memory ]

-------------------------------
Mayday Memory OP "Beyond Memories"

Words & Music by Lee Dongbin / Arranged by Kang Hyoseok
Vocal : PocKet Muzik_HYEBIN
-------------------------------

#maydaymemory #otomegame #lucydream
